Down to every seam and stitch, this is an exact reproduction of a 1930s traditional workshirt. Featuring ventilation eyelets in the underarms and triple-stitched, reinforced seams with real shell buttons. Cotton. Slim fit a narrower version of our regular fit that's slimmer through the body. Featuring Pesu's minimalist graphic, reading "Love Save Japan" on soft cotton jaspé, this tee not only looks good, it's for an extremely good cause. Enjoy free shipping on this tee. A workwear-inspired mate to the sportjacket, it works well with bucks or rolled with sandals." Japanese cotton chambray. Zip fly. Elastic back at waist. Buckle back. Cuffed. Partially lined. Product.Description: Inspired by the texture of sought-after vintage Japanese loopwheel fabric, we created this special, exceedingly soft fabric and used it to create this classic piece. Guaranteed to be a mainstay in your closet for years. Original fit. Cotton. Crewneck. Rib trim at neck, cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Heathered jersey henley
Product.Description: Spun in soft heathered cotton jersey with a subtle nubby texture and finished with a rib trim at the neck and cuffs, it's the perfect piece for layering. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: J.Crew Slim Broken In Pocket Tee
Product.Description: Soft jersey crew neck J.Crew T-shirt in dark grey with a chest pocket. A well-cut tee is a wardrobe essential - this versatile piece will work with everything from casual jeans to smarter chinos for go-anywhere style. Shown here with Polo Ralph Lauren trousers and J.Crew shoes.

Product.Name: Ludlow double-breasted peak lapel blazer with double-vented back
Product.Description:
The set piece of our suiting collection, this new double-breasted tuxedo-style blazer epitomizes sharp dressing. Expertly tailored in our trimmer Ludlow silhouette, it's meticulously crafted from four-season world-class wool fabric by Loro Piana. Bespoke-inspired details include intricate pickstitching along the lapels and interior and luxurious Bemberg lining. Ludlow, our most modern silhouette with a narrow lapel, square flaps on the pockets and a slightly shorter cut. Six-button closure. Nonfunctional buttons at cuffs. Double-vented back. Fully lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Newest fit in suiting.
  • Tailored, modern cut with a trim silhouette.

Product.Name: Indigo deck jacket
Product.Description: We took an ultra-hearty French terry fleece, dip-dyed it in indigo and washed it to absolute softness for a saturated, vintage-denim effect. This take on an old mariner's sweater has a shawl collar, lobster clip closures and lots of extra pockets. Made with a special weaving technique, it's a low-key alternative to a classic cardigan and is seriously timeless. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Import. Machine wash cold and inside-out. Indigo dye may rub off on light-colored fabric and upholstery.

Product.Name: J.Crew 16/20s Heavyweight Cotton Jersey T-shirt
Product.Description: J. Crew olive green 16/20s heavyweight slub crew neck T-shirt. Made from tough cotton that has been woven to last, this heavyweight T-shirt will be a wardrobe staple for years to come. The rugged texture of the jersey perfectly complements a plaid shirt and weekend jeans. Shown here with an A.P.C. blazer, Burberry Brit jeans, Church's shoes and an Incotex scarf.

Product.Name: Red selvedge chambray utility shirt
Product.Description: Inspired by vintage workwear from the early 1900s, this heirloom-worthy shirt is made from a blend of premium Japanese selvedge cotton and supersoft fine linen. Finished with authentic details like a tab collar with hidden buttons to secure it and a two-button extended collar band for reinforcement. Tailored fit. Point collar. Camp pockets. A Collector's Item. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: End-on-end utility shirt with pockets
Product.Description: A classic utility shirt crafted of end-on-end cotton. Inspired by vintage workwear from the early 1900s. Available in regular fit, tall and our newest slim fit a narrower version of our regular fit that's cut slimmer through the body. Point collar. Camp pockets. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: J.Crew Thomas Mason Spread Collar Cotton Shirt
Product.Description: Thomas Mason for J.Crew white cotton spread collar shirt with breast pocket and button cuffs. Clean, sharp and work appropriate, this shirt comes courtesy of a unique collaboration between the classic US brand and the quintessential British shirtmaker. Shown here with a J.Crew blazer, Levi's Made & Crafted trosuers, Alexander McQueen shoes and a PS by Paul Smith pocket square.

Product.Name: J.Crew Thomas Mason Gingham Spread Collar Shirt

Shown here with Maison Martin Margiela boots, a WANT Les Essentiels de la Vie bag and a J.Crew suit jacket and trousers.

Product.Name: Slub cotton polo

Original fit. Rib trim at neck and cuffs. Short sleeves. Side vents with tennis tail. Import. Machine wash.
